items.description: One item per object: 'object — room — actions' (no extra prose).

game-last-objects.description: Short list (up to 5) of the most recent objects seen; include the room and any actions taken.

game-room-path.description: A single sentence that succintly mentions exactly the last 4 rooms (in order) visited and how the player moved to each.

items.description: One item per change: 'change — trigger' (no extra prose).

game-last-changes.description: Short list (up to 5) of the most recent world changes and what triggered them.

game-intent.description: Brief, non-duplicative summary of what the game is presenting as the current situation.

game-meta-intent.description: High-level interpretation of the game's wider goal or story direction.

hidden-next-command.description: One actionable parser command the player could enter next.

hidden-next-command-confidence.description: Confidence (0–100) the command will not only heuristically go through, but also actually progress the player in the game story.

narration.description: Fun, explanatory without being duplicit, in-role commentary intended to enhance what's already on the screen without being redundant, spoiler-y or overtly inventive. Make it one or two short sentences.
